name: Freeppie
tag_list: social-travel-network, travel-for-free, social-reward, free-trips, booking-engine, travel-platform, ota, hotel, restaurants, tourism-services, tourism, travel, free, trip
overview:
Freeppie is the FIRST social travel network with the functionality of a booking platform TO REWARD people for sharing their travel experiences (social actions) with credits that can be used to book discounted and FREE TRIPS.

Free spaces come from the unstressed inventory of tourism operators (hotels,restaurants,etc.) which is offered to the market in exchange of nominal and certified visibility by travelers, who act as travel advisors.

This means giving operators the chance to generate social visibility using their inventory and special marketing actions and rewarding travelers for sharing travel experiences and generating that visibility.

Freeppie connects the functionality of social networks and booking engines. The project has a XML technology already developed which is comparable to the main booking engines of OTA (expedia, booking.com) offering to suppliers an easy and friendly access to the extranet a social and friendly users’ interface. Channel manager integration and the APP will be introduced soon.

For the first time users’ experiences are combined into an innovative business method that transforms social actions into a monetary value.

products.name: free and for sale hotel rooms
free and for sale tourism services
